https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2TN3Ei8IPcBlzrQTupkRmAqD6V0.jpg Part-time worker Hazuki lives with her younger sister, high school student Koharu, and their mother Sawa. One day they receive word that their estranged father is on his deathbed, so Sawa asks Hazuki and Koharu to visit him and take one last photo to remember him by. Capturing Dad
